import React, { useState } from "react"; import { InputGroup, FormControl, Button, Modal } from "react-bootstrap"; import style from "./Recommended.module.css"; function ModalButton() { const [show, setShow, email] = useState(false); const handleShowLogin = () => setShow(true); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); return ( <> Login Your Account Are You ready to survive in LIFEAFTER!

E-Mail Password ); } export default ModalButton;
